function.name: my_mobile_plan
function.description: Useful when get my mobile plan.

function.name: my_subscribed_add_ons
function.description: Useful for providing your subscribed add-ons(가입 된 부가서비스).

function.name: my_billing_charge
function.description: Useful when you need to provide recent billing charges (for last month's usage).

function.name: my_realtime_billing_charge
function.description: Useful when you need to provide real-time billing charges based on current month usage.

function.name: my_realtime_data_usage
function.description: Useful when guide real-time data usage/residuals.

function.name: my_shared_data_usage
function.description: Useful when you need to provide shared and tethered data usage or residuals.

function.name: my_average_data_usage
function.description: Useful for providing average data usage from last 3 months data usage.

function.name: remaining_data_refill_coupons
function.description: Useful for guiding about remaining data refill coupons.

function.name: remaining_data_gift
function.description: Useful for guiding whether data can be gifted and how many times it remains available.

function.name: t_family_data_usage
function.description: Useful for guiding status of 'T가족모아데이터' data usage.

function.name: t_family_data_change_shared_amount
function.description: Useful for changing to 'T가족모아데이터' shared data amount.

function.name: remaining_no_contract_plan_points
function.description: Useful for checking points remaining on no-contract plans(무약정플랜).

function.name: billing_charge_analyze_summary
function.description: Useful for providing how user's billing history compares to the previous month.

function.name: billing_charge_analyze_discount
function.description: Useful for providing details of the discount on billing charges and the increase/decrease compared to last month.

function.name: billing_charge_data_usage
function.description: Useful for providing data usage for this month and compare to last month.

function.name: COMPARE_BETWEEN_MOBILE_PLAN
function.description: Useful when compare features of multiple SKTelecom mobile plans.

function.name: COMPARE_CHANGE_MY_MOBILE_PLAN
function.description: Useful when compare when changing your plan.

plan.description: SKTelecom mobile plan you want to change.

function.name: SEARCH_MOBILE_PLAN
function.description: This function searches or offer mobile plans based on a specific keyword.

function.name: changable_date_for_plan
function.description: Useful for checking how long user have to stay on user's current plan and when user can change it.

function.name: plan_auto_change_date
function.description: This function is used to inform about when user's plan is automatically changed and what plan it's being changed to.

function.name: plan_auto_change_date_alarm
function.description: Useful for signing up for an alert when a user can change user's plan.

function.name: recommend_plans
function.description: Useful for recommending plans to users.

function.name: estimated_billing_charge_compare_to_current
function.description: Useful for providing an estimated bill when changing plan or signing up for a subscription.

function.name: check_plan_availability
function.description: This function is used to check whether user can subscribe to the given plan.
